about_the_game:
Amazing artwork inspired by the Pirates and their adventures, specially designed for you to be enchanted.

Let the desktop of your computer with a unique look!

There are 6 images with 3840 x 2160 pixels and Ultra Wide (2560 x 1080 pixels).

After downloading this add-on will be available in the directory where the game “Hidden Shapes Black Skull” is installed, by default, it is (...\Steam\steamapps\common\ Hidden Shapes Black Skull \ Hidden Shapes Black Skull - Wallpapers).
